titleStmt.title: Grace to the humble· As preparations to receive the Sacrament. Preached by the late famous preacher Iohn Preston, Doctor of Divinity, and chaplen in ordinary to his Mtie. Master of Immanuel Colledge, and sometimes preacher in Lincolnes-Inne.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Michael Sparke Iunior, and are to be sold at the signe of the Blue Bible in Greene Arbour,

notesStmt.note: A different version of "The doctrine of self-denial" in "Three godly and learned treatises" (STC 20221.7).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
